channel.title: Pride Scape #498 Bringing Back 2008
channel.description:
Pride Scape #498
Pride Scape #498 Features
3 Different Modes to play on Castle Wars Duel Arena /no bugs Music System Report Abuse system WITH muting Random Events Advanced Cooking - Pie's, Pizza's, Dough Pets Points - Slayer Points/Voting Points/Pking Points/Skiller Points + Reward Shops Quests Better Eating System (Effects, Drinks, Food) Sound System Quest Cape - When a new Quest is added, the cape auto removes Full Clipping + Dancing (As in RuneScape) Fight Pits - NO DUPES Farming Upgrade Fairly Done Combat System 498 Feeling Much More
What does pride scape have to offer ?
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/30ibxmp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/149y0jb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/auuw7p.jpg[/img]
Release Date? Pride Scape #498 is launching beta mid July so players can experience our community & our development team.
Website? http://pridescape498.webs.com/ We are hopefully going to get a domain soon as possible.
Moderators? We are currently looking for moderators if you are interested contact lostlegacy@live.com for further information.

item.title: Pride Scape #498 Bringing Back 2008
item.dc:creator: @Pride_Scape_Team Pride Scape Team
item.description:
@Pride_Scape_Team wrote:

Pride Scape #498

Pride Scape #498 Features

3 Different Modes to play on
Castle Wars
Duel Arena /no bugs
Music System
Report Abuse system WITH muting
Random Events
Advanced Cooking - Pie's, Pizza's, Dough
Pets
Points - Slayer Points/Voting Points/Pking Points/Skiller Points + Reward Shops
Quests
Better Eating System (Effects, Drinks, Food)
Sound System
Quest Cape - When a new Quest is added, the cape auto removes
Full Clipping + Dancing (As in RuneScape)
Fight Pits - NO DUPES
Farming Upgrade
Fairly Done Combat System
498 Feeling
Much More

What does pride scape have to offer ?

Release Date? Pride Scape #498 is launching beta mid July so players can experience our community & our development team.

Website? http://pridescape498.webs.com/ We are hopefully going to get a domain soon as possible.

Moderators? We are currently looking for moderators if you are interested contact lostlegacy@live.com for further information.
